title: 求解
author: congco88
txt_content:
我的minecraft安装了MOD后就出现了英文字幕：
Mods loaded: 3
ModLoader 1.2.5
mod_ModLoaderMp 1.2.5v1
mod_ReiMinimap v3.0_04汉化by大刘 [1.2.4]
      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.


--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT d4027e12 --------
Generated 12-6-16 下午4:23
Minecraft: Minecraft 1.2.5
OS: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
Java: 1.7.0_04, Oracle Corporation
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
LWJGL: 2.4.2
OpenGL: GeForce 6150 LE/integrated/SSE2/3DNOW! version 2.1.2, NVIDIA Corporation
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: yr.getIconIndex(Laan;ILyw;Laan;I)I
 at yw.b(EntityPlayer.java:1767)
 at mn.a(SourceFile:46)
 at we.a(SourceFile:299)
 at we.b(SourceFile:14)
 at fe.a(SourceFile:124)
 at we.a(SourceFile:92)
 at we.a(SourceFile:14)
 at ahu.a(ahu.java:149)
 at ahu.a(ahu.java:143)
 at l.a(RenderGlobal.java:452)
 at lr.a(EntityRenderer.java:1272)
 at lr.b(EntityRenderer.java:1010)
 at EntityRendererProxy.b(EntityRendererProxy.java:21)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.x(SourceFile:752)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(SourceFile:671)
 at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT ed83748b ----------
怎么解决？
还有，我想问一下安装MOD有什么技巧不会使其冲突?
在线等待。。。

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content: 如果一次很多个mod，难免不冲突，推荐用懒人包，如果真的很要的话。。。
